class.name: ImageTexture
class.description: A [Texture2D] based on an [Image]. Can be created from an [Image] with [method create_from_image]. [b]Note:[/b] The maximum image size is 16384Ã—16384 pixels due to graphics hardware limitations. Larger images will fail to import.

method.name: get_format
method.description: Returns the format of the [ImageTexture], one of [enum Image.Format].

method.name: set_size_override
method.description: Resizes the [ImageTexture] to the specified dimensions.

method.name: update
method.description: Replaces the texture's data with a new [code]image[/code]. If [code]immediate[/code] is [code]true[/code], it will take effect immediately after the call.
